response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. This remarkable item holds immense value to us and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. After careful consideration, we propose a price of $1,200,000 for this product. We are confident that this offer strikes a balance between fair compensation for us and an attractive opportunity for you. We look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 1200000}
